divs: sighting detailsi let my dog out at approx 7:45 pm. i noticed three bright stationary non-blinking lights to the east of our farm. they were the color of a bright street light only a little more yellow. the lights were in a flattened triangular shape and were stationary. i went in the house and retrieved my 7x50 steiner binoculars. i observed the lights for the next 15 or 20 minutes. i could make out no physical detail in the lights. the lights then moved north slowly and seemed to spread out horizontally a little. the lights then went out either blocked by trees at the edge our fence or disappeared. i walked north to the driveway to see the area of the sky that the lights were moving toward but they did not reappear. instead i observed two sets of blinking type avation lights at fairly high altitude moving toward each other. one appeared higher than the other (one from the east one from the north-east. i watched them for a moment thinking to my self that they were pretty close together. all during this sighting, it was very quiet...no car motors, no sounds of planes or avaition motors. i later phoned my wife in comanche county and related the story. she said that about the time i was watching the lights, extremely loud booms were heard by herself and family. i surmised that they were sonic booms because they rattled the windows and were "felt". the lights i saw were not lights on an aircraft. they were too bright and too large. they did not appear to be search lights of any kind i have ever seen. the lights were the wrong color to be high intensity type observation lights which are bright white. i believe that the towns of gorman or de leon are (as the crow flies)in the direction that i saw the lights. the lay of the land to the east is too flat for these lights to be on to the ground. i was not upset by this. mostly puzzled. i have been interested in the night sky and astronomy my whole life and i have never seen anything like this. this is a rural location and the closest neighbor is approx 1\2 mile to the south. my wife phoned me @ 5pm the next day saying she overheard someone talking in a cafe in comanche tx saying they had seen strange lights the same night.
Summary: A triangle of bright stationary lights in the sky east of my location.
